abstract: Google’s chief executive said that while his company considered buying a newspaper or using its charitable arm to support news businesses seeking nonprofit status, it is now unlikely to do either.
snippet: Google’s chief executive said that while his company considered buying a newspaper or using its charitable arm to support news businesses seeking nonprofit status, it is now unlikely to do either.
lead_paragraph: Industry watchers speculating that Google might ride in and buy The New York Times Company may be disappointed to learn that the search engine’s chief executive says he has no plans to deploy Google’s cash in the service of newspapers.

headline.main: Google to Pass on Newspaper Deals
